revised_title: Botanical and Zoological Discoveries in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez
tldr: The author presents a detailed account of the botanical, petrological, and zoological collections made during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez in 1874-75. The article focuses on the unique flora and fauna, particularly fungi, found in these locations, providing descriptions and classifications of the collected specimens.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Botany and Mycology
